rationales.achievement: He emphasizes closing a profitable bulk deal quickly and treats execution quality as proof of competence.
rationales.stimulation: He describes the fast-moving deal as energizing and identity-affirming.
He actively seeks new markets and suppliers because routine resale options feel saturated and limiting.

rationales.conformity: He deliberately gives polite non-answers and redirects dinner conversation to avoid family conflict.
rationales.self_direction: He withholds his real position to keep the peace instead of asserting his own path openly.

rationales.conformity: He says he'll consider the stable family option largely to relieve his father's anxiety.
rationales.self_direction: He suppresses key business momentum (the Seoul partnership) rather than advocating for his own judgment.

rationales.conformity: He seriously considers taking the uncle's job to reduce family tension and preserve approval.
rationales.self_direction: He frames saying no as socially costly even though his own analysis supports staying on his venture.

rationales.conformity: He defers again by promising to talk tomorrow, prioritizing household harmony in the moment.
rationales.self_direction: He explicitly rejects being guilted into hedging and insists on deciding his future on his own terms.
